name: places/ChIJ__Hq8fxYwokR15Q9AxA8vI4
formattedAddress: 455 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 455 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022-6845, USA

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of witnessing Steve Cohen's magic show at the iconic Hotel Palace in New York, and I must say, it was an experience beyond words. Dubbed as "The Millionaires’ Magician," Cohen lived up to his reputation, delivering what is undeniably the most incredible magic performance I have ever seen. The entire show, which felt like it whisked by in a mere five minutes despite lasting two hours, was a testament to Cohen's mastery over his craft.

Every trick in his repertoire was astounding, with the highlight being the unbelievable teapot trick that left us all in sheer amazement. But it wasn't just the tricks themselves that were impressive; Cohen possesses a unique ability to make the impossible seem possible, guessing personal details and information about his audience that were seemingly plucked from thin air, items and thoughts that couldn’t possibly be known in advance.

What made the evening even more special was how Cohen engages with his audience, making us feel like an integral part of the magic. His show was not just a performance but an interactive experience that had us all participating and fully immersed in the world of magic. I chose to celebrate my birthday by attending his show, and it turned out to be a spectacular decision.

The setting of the show in an old French-style salon within the Hotel Palace added an extra layer of elegance and charm to the evening, perfectly complementing Cohen's sophisticated and enchanting performance. The beautiful, antique ambiance of the venue provided the ideal backdrop for a night of wonder and mystery.

In conclusion, Steve Cohen's magic show is not to be missed. If you're looking for an experience that combines elegance, astonishment, and a touch of the impossible, this is it. Cohen is not just a magician; he is a true artist who knows how to leave his audience spellbound and yearning for more. My birthday celebration at his show was nothing short of magical, making it a memory I will cherish forever.

---

originalText.text: This was an amazing show, well worth the time and money. The show took place in a beautiful historic location and was high class. The magic was undeniably legit! My 16 year old son was chosen to volunteer for a ‘trick’ and we were blown away by this magical moment!! I cannot recommend this show enough.

text.text: This was an amazing show, well worth the time and money. The show took place in a beautiful historic location and was high class. The magic was undeniably legit! My 16 year old son was chosen to volunteer for a ‘trick’ and we were blown away by this magical moment!! I cannot recommend this show enough.

originalText.text: Took my husband to a Chamber Magic show for his birthday around Christmas time and wow we were blown away! We didn’t know what to expect, mostly had just heard good things from a friend, but we truly couldn’t believe some of the things Steve was able to do! The whole vibe is fun - getting dressed up, being in a fancy hotel parlor, Christmas decorations, and of course a fantastic entertainer. He asked the audience who had seen the show before and many people were returning guests which is a testament to the quality. I won’t spoil anything about the show but highly recommend this activity to anyone - super unique and engaging. A must do!

originalText.text: A beautiful evening of thrills and wonder! The setting is glorious and the show is truly astounding. You will witness things that cannot be explained in any way other than *magic*. I laughed, I gasped, I was spellbound! I attended during the holiday season and the hotel that hosts the show was decked out like a winter wonderland. A perfect NYC experience. Don’t miss it!

originalText.text: This show took me by total surprise!! I’m not a typical fan of magic acts. I bought tickets for my daughter’s 27 birthday because she had heard the show is really good. WOW!! The show is fantastic!! Incredibly creative, funny and unbelievable!! All taking place in a beautiful room. Not to be missed!!
